sections.title: Idea
sections.content: Create an app for a pizzeria to streamline ordering, customization, and delivery.

sections.title: Market Research
sections.content: Conduct research on existing pizzerias' apps, customer preferences, and market trends to identify gaps and opportunities.

sections.title: Business Model
sections.content: The business model will be based on commission from each order placed through the app and potential in-app advertising from partner businesses.

content.Description: Charge a percentage fee for each order processed through the app.
Generate revenue by offering ad space in the app to local businesses.
Business owners looking for a convenient and efficient way to manage orders and customer interactions.
People who enjoy pizza and are seeking a simple, user-friendly way to order their favorite dishes.

sections.title: Marketing Plan
sections.content: Utilize social media marketing, local partnerships, and targeted advertising to reach potential customers and pizzeria owners.

sections.title: Launch Plan
sections.content: Develop a Minimum Viable Product (MVP), perform beta testing, gather feedback, and iterate before a full-scale launch.
